pages.title: Purified Water Bottles
pages.text: Fill bottles with water and place them on a lit campfire.$(br2)They will turn into purified water bottles

pages.title: More Bottles
pages.text: You need level 2 in smithing to use the furnace.$(br2)Gather sand, smelt it into glass & craft more bottles.

pages.title: Acquire Copper
pages.text: You need level 6 in mining to break copper ores.$(br2)This is important for advanced methods of water purification.

pages.title: Campfire Cauldron
pages.text: $(br)Purify Water easily.$(br)This is the best solution early game combined with leather flasks.$(br2)Place the copper cauldron on top of a campfire.

pages.title: Collect Rain Water
pages.text: $(br)The copper cauldron allows you to collect fresh rain water.

pages.title: Bamboo Pump
pages.text: $(br)Place a bottle, flask or bucket onto it, to fill them with fresh water.$(br)$(li)1 min cooldown
